arts.ttl: Inter vs. Fiorentina to get back on track
arts.sum: Inter look to regain momentum after defeat to Napoli, while Fiorentina continue their search for a first league victory. After their defeat to Napoli, which ended a run of four consecutive league wins, Inter look to bounce back at home against Fiorentina.
